<style>
    .header-container {
        background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.95);
        width: 100%;
        padding: 15px 30px;
        position: fixed;
        top: 0;
        left: 0;
        box-shadow: 0 2px 10px rgba(0, 255, 0, 0.1);
        backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
        z-index: 1000;
    }

    .header-content {
        max-width: 1400px;
        margin: 0 auto;
        display: flex;
        justify-content: space-between;
        align-items: center;
    }

    .logo-container {
        flex: 0 0 auto;
    }

    .logo-image {
        height: 60px;
        width: auto;
        transition: transform 0.3s ease;
    }

    .logo-image:hover {
        transform: scale(1.05);
    }

    .nav-container {
        flex: 1;
        display: flex;
        justify-content: flex-end;
    }

    .nav-list {
        list-style: none;
        margin: 0;
        padding: 0;
        display: flex;
        gap: 40px;
        align-items: center;
    }

    .nav-link {
        color: #00FF00;
        text-decoration: none;
        font-size: 16px;
        font-weight: 600;
        padding: 8px 0;
        position: relative;
        transition: all 0.3s ease;
        text-transform: uppercase;
        letter-spacing: 0.5px;
    }

    .nav-link:after {
        content: '';
        position: absolute;
        width: 0;
        height: 2px;
        bottom: 0;
        left: 0;
        background-color: #00FF00;
        transition: width 0.3s ease;
    }

    .nav-link:hover:after {
        width: 100%;
    }

    /* Dropdown Styles */
    .dropdown {
        position: relative;
    }

    .dropdown-content {
        display: none;
        position: absolute;
        background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.95);
        min-width: 220px;
        box-shadow: 0 8px 24px rgba(0, 255, 0, 0.15);
        border-radius: 4px;
        border: 1px solid rgba(0, 255, 0, 0.2);
        top: 100%;
        left: 50%;
        transform: translateX(-50%);
        padding: 8px 0;
        opacity: 0;
        transition: opacity 0.3s ease;
        backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
        z-index: 1002;
    }

    .dropdown:hover .dropdown-content {
        display: block;
        opacity: 1;
    }

    .dropdown-link {
        color: #00FF00;
        text-decoration: none;
        padding: 12px 20px;
        display: block;
        font-size: 15px;
        font-weight: 500;
        text-align: left;
        white-space: nowrap;
        transition: all 0.2s ease;
    }

    .dropdown-link:hover {
        background-color: rgba(0, 255, 0, 0.1);
        padding-left: 25px;
    }

    .submenu {
        left: 100%;
        top: -8px;
        transform: none;
    }

    .dropdown:hover > .dropdown-content.submenu {
        display: block;
    }

    /* Mobile Menu Toggle */
    .menu-toggle {
        display: none;
        background: none;
        border: none;
        cursor: pointer;
        padding: 5px;
        margin-left: 10px;
        z-index: 1003;
    }

    .menu-toggle span {
        display: block;
        width: 25px;
        height: 3px;
        margin: 5px 0;
        background: #00FF00;
        transition: all 0.3s ease;
    }

    /* Responsive Styles */
    @media (max-width: 1024px) {
        .nav-list {
            gap: 30px;
        }
        .nav-link {
            font-size: 15px;
        }
    }

    @media (max-width: 768px) {
        .header-container {
            padding: 10px 20px;
        }
        .menu-toggle {
            display: block;
        }
        .nav-container {
            position: fixed; /* Changed from absolute to fixed */
            top: 80px;
            left: 0;
            width: 100%;
            background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.95);
            max-height: 0;
            overflow: hidden;

        /* Add explicit plus indicator for dropdowns */

            transform: translateY(-50%);
            font-size: 18px;
            font-weight: bold;
            color: #00FF00;
            pointer-events: none;
        }
        .dropdown.active > .nav-link:before {
            content: '−'; /* Using minus sign instead of rotating plus */
        }
        .dropdown-content {
            position: static;
            width: 100%;

            border: none;
            box-shadow: none;
            max-height: 0;
            overflow: hidden;
            opacity: 1;
            display: block;
            padding: 0;
            margin-left: 15px;
            transition: max-height 0.3s ease;
            z-index: 1;
        }
        .dropdown.active .dropdown-content {

        .dropdown-link {

        /* Fix submenu position */
        .submenu {

            margin-left: 15px;
        }
    }

    @media (max-width: 480px) {

<!-- JavaScript for Mobile Menu -->
<script>
    document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
        const menuToggle = document.querySelector('.menu-toggle');
        const navContainer = document.querySelector('.nav-container');
        const dropdowns = document.querySelectorAll('.dropdown');
        
        // Toggle mobile menu
        menuToggle.addEventListener('click', function() {
            navContainer.classList.toggle('active');
            // Prevent body scrolling when menu is open
            document.body.style.overflow = navContainer.classList.contains('active') ? 'hidden' : '';
        });
        
        // Handle dropdowns on mobile
        dropdowns.forEach(dropdown => {
            const link = dropdown.querySelector('.nav-link, .dropdown-link');
            link.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
                if (window.innerWidth <= 768) {
                    if (dropdown.classList.contains('dropdown') && 
                        dropdown.querySelector('.dropdown-content')) {
                        e.preventDefault();
                        e.stopPropagation(); // Prevent event bubbling
                        
                        // Close other same-level dropdowns
                        const parentUl = dropdown.parentNode;
                        const siblings = parentUl.querySelectorAll(':scope > .dropdown');
                        siblings.forEach(sibling => {
                            if (sibling !== dropdown) {
                                sibling.classList.remove('active');
                            }
                        });
                        
                        dropdown.classList.toggle('active');
                    }
                }
            });
        });
        
        // Close menu when clicking outside
        document.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
            if (window.innerWidth <= 768 && 
                !navContainer.contains(e.target) && 
                !menuToggle.contains(e.target) && 
                navContainer.classList.contains('active')) {
                navContainer.classList.remove('active');
                document.body.style.overflow = '';
            }
        });
        
        // Update menu behavior on window resize
        window.addEventListener('resize', function() {
            if (window.innerWidth > 768) {
                navContainer.classList.remove('active');
                dropdowns.forEach(dropdown => {
                    dropdown.classList.remove('active');
                });
                document.body.style.overflow = '';
            }
        });
    });
</script>

data-animation-class><div><p>Crave that nostalgic rush of glee from the golden era of TV pranks? Feel the urge to be at the receiving end of that gloriously gooey sliming? Or perhaps, you’re itching to drench your pals in goo? Slime’s resurgence isn't just a fad – it’s a stretchy, squishy sensation sweeping across the globe! But let’s face it, the slime of today – a sticky concoction of glue, borax, and more – is a mess waiting to happen, especially in your kid's locks and definitely not something you’d risk near your mouth.</p><p></p><p>Enter the world of GUNGE – the ultimate blast of fun, designed for splashing, sploshing, and dunk tank shenanigans! Fancy something outlandishly outrageous? Try our edible gunge recipe, whipped up from simple flour, instant pudding, and water, ensuring every drip and dollop is delightfully non-toxic.  Why settle for sliming when you can take your prankster game up a notch with a GUNGING! Unleash the high-jinks the British way – get GUNGED!</p></div></div><!----><!----><!----><span></span><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----></div><!--]--><!--]--></div><!----><!----><!----><!----><span></span><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----></div><!--]--><!--]--></div><!----><!----><!----><!----><span></span><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----></div><!--]--><!--]--></div><!----><!----><!----><!----><span></span><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----></div><!--]--><!--[--><div id="paragraph-Bw93FJIzKs" class="c-paragraph c-wrapper"><!----><!----><!----><div class="paragraph-Bw93FJIzKs text-output cparagraph-Bw93FJIzKs noBorder radius0 none" data-animation-class><div><p>How often do we sacrifice the thrill of unforgettable moments by yielding to insecurities or fretting over our looks? In a society fixated on outer beauty, "DRIPPING IN CONFIDENCE" stands as a bold metaphor. Brimming with self-assuredness is key to embracing the slather of slime. This zesty challenge is a vibrant way to declare to friends, admirers, or anyone in your circle that you're all about embracing joy, spreading love, and truly living!</p><p></p><p>"DRIPPING IN CONFIDENCE" is the ultimate vibe for that epic photo-op with your squad, to celebrate a grad's milestone, to jazz up wedding frocks in a Trash The Dress moment, or to spice up any event on the hunt for giggles! Dive into the experience just for kicks or turn it into a noble cause to benefit your chosen charity! And why not amp up the excitement? DARE someone to bask in the GUNGE glory.</p></div></div><!----><!----><!----><span></span><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----></div><!--]--><!--]--></div><!----><!----><!----><!----><span></span><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----><!----></div><!--]--><!--[--><div that nostalgic rush of glee from the golden era of TV pranks? Feel the urge to be at the receiving end of that gloriously gooey sliming? Or perhaps, you’re itching to drench your pals in goo? Slime’s resurgence isn't just a fad – it’s a stretchy, squishy sensation sweeping across the globe! But let’s face it, the slime of today – a sticky concoction of glue, borax, and more – is a mess waiting to happen, especially in your kid's locks and definitely not something you’d risk near your mouth.\u003C/p>\u003Cp>\u003C/p>\u003Cp>Enter the world of GUNGE – the ultimate blast of fun, designed for splashing, sploshing, and dunk tank shenanigans! Why settle for sliming when you can take your prankster game up a notch with a GUNGING! Our Story Our Team Gallery Blog Careers Don't forget to unmute! INTRODUCING "GUNGE" TO THE USA Crave that nostalgic rush of glee from the golden era of TV pranks? Feel the urge to be at the receiving end of that gloriously gooey sliming? Or perhaps, you’re itching to drench your pals in goo? Slime’s resurgence isn't just a fad – it’s a stretchy, squishy sensation sweeping across the globe! But let’s face it, the slime of today – a sticky concoction of glue, borax, and more – is a mess waiting to happen, especially in your kid's locks and definitely not something you’d risk near your mouth. Enter the world of GUNGE – the ultimate blast of fun, designed for splashing, sploshing, and dunk tank shenanigans! Fancy something outlandishly outrageous? Try our edible gunge recipe, whipped up from simple flour, instant pudding, and water, ensuring every drip and dollop is delightfully non-toxic.
Why settle for sliming when you can take your prankster game up a notch with a GUNGING! Unleash the high-jinks the British way – get GUNGED! WHY "DRIPPING IN CONFIDENCE?": GET GUNGED LIKE NO ONE'S WATCHING! How often do we sacrifice the thrill of unforgettable moments by yielding to insecurities or fretting over our looks? In a society fixated on outer beauty, "DRIPPING IN CONFIDENCE" stands as a bold metaphor. Brimming with self-assuredness is key to embracing the slather of slime. This zesty challenge is a vibrant way to declare to friends, admirers, or anyone in your circle that you're all about embracing joy, spreading love, and truly living! "DRIPPING IN CONFIDENCE" is the ultimate vibe for that epic photo-op with your squad, to celebrate a grad's milestone, to jazz up wedding frocks in a Trash The Dress moment, or to spice up any event on the hunt for giggles! Dive into the experience just for kicks or turn it into a noble cause to benefit your chosen charity! And why not amp up the excitement? DARE someone to bask in the GUNGE glory. Unmute to hear some of the music that we play at these events! There are a lot of ways to include gunge in your events. Here are a couple ideas to get started... Trash The Wedding Dress Picture a playful wedding moment: the bride, in a washable white dress, stands on stage with family and friends cheering her on. Suddenly, colorful slime—soft pinks, greens, and blues—gently drizzles down, covering her gown as she laughs and raises her arms in delight. It's a joyful, unforgettable twist, capturing the couple’s fun-loving spirit and creating a memorable, laughter-filled moment for everyone. This is the kind of environment that we wish to create for those who are starting an amazing journey together. Graduation Gunge Celebrate graduation with an unforgettable twist—a slime celebration! Picture your grads standing together, ready for a joyous, colorful send-off. As vibrant slime rains down, laughter and cheers erupt, transforming their caps and gowns into bright, messy works of art. It’s not just a celebration; it’s a memory in the making! This event goes beyond tradition, letting grads revel in their accomplishments with playful, carefree energy that marks the start of their next chapter. It’s fun, photogenic, and uniquely thrilling—an experience they’ll remember forever. Let’s create a graduation celebration they’ll never forget! DRIPPING IN CONFIDENCE PRICING Gunge events offer adaptable entertainment for various budgets, ranging from affordable fun to more elaborate setups. Reach out to us at 252-764-7628 for a hassle-free discussion about your gunge event dreams, including event type, venue size, materials, power needs, audience size, and budgetary constraints. At Emerald Owl Productions, we create immersive gunge experiences with exciting, custom-designed themes and provide discounts for multi-day bookings. We also offer affordable solutions for one-off events. Call us to find the perfect balance for a memorable and budget-friendly slime event. With initial details sorted, the rest of the planning is a breeze—we’re here to create an unforgettable slime experience that fits your budget.
